message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE. 

This paper proposes a method for few-shot continual learning in classification tasks, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The method involves learning and storing prototypes, which are commonly used in computer vision tasks (cs.CV) and natural language processing tasks (cs.CL). The method also involves avoiding catastrophic forgetting, which is a common challenge in neural networks (cs.NE).
